extracted_playbook.title: Apply Update When Available
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the update provided by Hitachi Energy as soon as it becomes available to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disconnect MSM from Internet
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the MSM device is not directly connected to the internet to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement User Access Management
extracted_playbook.description: Adopt user access management and use OS inbuilt functionality to limit unauthorized access via MSM Client application.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Antivirus Protection
extracted_playbook.description: Equip computers with the latest antivirus protection engines and signature rules that operate the MSM Client application.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow CIS Hardening Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Implement hardening guidelines published by the Center for Internet Security (CIS) to protect host operating systems connected to MSM.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Firewall and Security Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Physically protect process control systems, separate networks with firewalls, and ensure portable devices are virus-free before connecting to control systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures as recommended by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement CISA Recommended Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Follow CISA's recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, including defense-in-depth strategies.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
